positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Executive Head of Corporate, Media, and Public Relations portfolio and responsible for the partnerships and publicity of the events• Led 38 Associate Managers and witnessed the highest PAN India participation of 1240 participants in Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2024• Spearheaded 18 Associate Managers to bring Sponsors and Media Partners for Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive, Local Startups' Meet, Empresario, and Global Entrepreneurship Summit which are 4 of the largest PAN India events organized by a student-run organization • Led the Sponsorship team to bring monetary partnerships worth “X” million INR and of 44 media associations for the year 2022-23, including WestBrdige Capital, Larsen and Toubro Limited, Audi, and Oil India Limited in the portfolio
positions.title: Senior Manager | Corporate & Media Relations and Public Relations
positions.description_html:
• Executive Head of Corporate, Media, and Public Relations portfolio and responsible for the partnerships and publicity of the events
• Led 38 Associate Managers and witnessed the highest PAN India participation of 1240 participants in Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2024
• Spearheaded 18 Associate Managers to bring Sponsors and Media Partners for Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive, Local Startups' Meet, Empresario, and Global Entrepreneurship Summit which are 4 of the largest PAN India events organized by a student-run organization
• Led the Sponsorship team to bring monetary partnerships worth “X” million INR and of 44 media associations for the year 2022-23, including WestBrdige Capital, Larsen and Toubro Limited, Audi, and Oil India Limited in the portfolio

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Focused on getting monetary sponsorships worth 9 lakhs INR from the Fintech, Crypto, and Consulting firms for EAD-LSM'21 and GES'22 • Managed logistics of offline branding in GES 2022 in IIT Kharagpur Campus to display the visibility of 22 Sponsors and 23 Media Bodies• Hosted Connecting the Dots 2022, and mentored over 20 E-Cells to grow and support the entrepreneurial ecosystem in India

positions.description_html:

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Handled the Corporate and Media Relations portfolio which kept me in dialog with top corporate CXOs in India to build associations• Attained monetary partnership for EAD-LSM 2021 from the sectors of FinTech, Crypto Wallets, OTT, NFT and Luggage Sector• Managed a team of 250+ Campus Ambassadors to ensure a nationwide diverse audience from 250+ colleges in EAD-LSM 2021• Organized the 1st Edition of EAD in Jabalpur, which consisted of eminent speakers from top organizations who inspired 700+students

• Handled the Corporate and Media Relations portfolio which kept me in dialog with top corporate CXOs in India to build associations

experience.title: Strategy and Analytics
experience.description: • Devised a comprehensive strategy to integrate 8 of the Cisco products with portfolio start-ups of PEAK XV, Blume VC, and Endiya Partners• Developed and executed a multifaceted 3-level strategy to transition 5 start-ups within Cisco's portfolio for tech adoption of it's products• Represented "Cisco for Startups" at 4 prestigious TiE and Zinnov events, exposing the booth’s technological advantages to the start-ups• Interviewed 10 innovative start-up founders in sustainability technology, driving pivotal primary research for Cisco’s sales strategy

experience.title: Product Management
experience.description: • Identified and addressed 3 key issues impacting customer experience, leading to enhanced product solutions for consumer pain points• Developed 2 feature specs, for MZAALO NFT Marketplace, to buy and sell NFTs for fix price rate or auctions through crypto currency• Generated 5 PRDs along with user stories and acceptance criterias to develop a product strategy and product road map in 4 phases
